text: For infection of HLA cultures, 2 Ã— 10 6 cells were incubated overnight with virus preparations equivalent to 1 ng of p24, and cell culture supernatant was collected every second or third day post infection. Where indicated, the cells were treated with different concentrations of the DIs P22077 or PR-619 as part of the medium change on the delineated days post infection (dpi).
